channel.title: I can't do it... my third thread, I JUST CANT DO IT!
channel.description:
I followed the tutorials, I can't get it to work... LS just opens and appears to be fine and closes.
YET, I GET HELP THAT CONSISTS OF 5 WORDS OR LESS.
y=9w4y4w=ywdkheiksh[ioh[wiro *nerd rage*

item.title: I can't do it... my third thread, I JUST CANT DO IT!
item.dc:creator: @lokar lokar
item.description:
@lokar wrote:

It closes way too fast to get a screenshot - I tried 34 times.

It basically just begans to work than closes.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 12:23:47 pm[/size][hr]Well ILL BE DAMNED IT WORKED!!! HAAHA[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 12:31:42 pm[/size][hr]Fail.

It stays open now, but I can’t get the server to connect to LS

It just says:

attempting to connect to LS

Read full topic
item.source: I can't do it... my third thread, I JUST CANT DO IT!

item.title: I can't do it... my third thread, I JUST CANT DO IT!
item.dc:creator: @nate_o nate o
item.description:
@nate_o wrote:

Go into the folder than contains ant.
Then edit all the .batch files and add “pause” at the end of the text that is there.

Once you’ve done that, then post a screen-shot of what the text says once you attempt to run LS.
If you need any help doing this, add me on MSN. gojowonoko@yahoo.com

Read full topic

item.title: I can't do it... my third thread, I JUST CANT DO IT!
item.dc:creator: @ollie180 ollie180
item.description:
@ollie180 wrote:

It might be due to you having Windows Vista, as I had the same problems trying to set up a lan connection for a server through Vista. I’m pretty sure it can be done, try searching how to port forward on vista and how to unblock the firewall for your server.

Read full topic
